shows.name: The Crown
shows.synopsis: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.
shows.cast: Claire Foy, Matt Smith, Olivia Colman
shows.creator: Peter Morgan

shows.name: Black Mirror
shows.synopsis: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech world where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.
shows.cast: Daniel Lapaine, Hannah John-Kamen, Michaela Coel
shows.creator: Charlie Brooker

shows.name: The Haunting of Hill House
shows.synopsis: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.
shows.cast: Michiel Huisman, Carla Gugino, Timothy Hutton
shows.creator: Mike Flanagan

shows.name: The Witcher
shows.synopsis: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
shows.cast: Henry Cavill, Anya Chalotra, Freya Allan
shows.creator: Lauren Schmidt Hissrich

shows.name: Money Heist
shows.synopsis: A group of very peculiar robbers have assaulted the Factory of Moneda and Timbre to carry out the most perfect robbery in the history of Spain and taking home 2,400 million euros.
shows.cast: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte
shows.creator: Álex Pina

shows.name: Narcos
shows.synopsis: The true story of Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels.
shows.cast: Wagner Moura, Boyd Holbrook, Pedro Pascal
shows.creator: Samuel Adelson

shows.name: Stranger Things
shows.synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
shows.cast: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder
shows.creator: The Duffer Brothers

shows.name: Breaking Bad
shows.synopsis: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
shows.cast: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn
shows.creator: Vince Gilligan

shows.name: Game of Thrones
shows.synopsis: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while a forgotten race returns after being dormant for thousands of years.
shows.cast: Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington, Lena Headey
shows.creator: David Benioff, D. B. Weiss

shows.name: The Office
shows.synopsis: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.
shows.cast: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
shows.creator: Greg Daniels

shows.name: Peaky Blinders
shows.synopsis: A gangster family epic set in 1919 Birmingham, England and centered on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.
shows.cast: Cillian Murphy, Helen McCrory, Paul Anderson
shows.creator: Steven Knight

shows.name: The Sopranos
shows.synopsis: New Jersey mob boss, Tony Soprano, deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life.
shows.cast: James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco, Edie Falco
shows.creator: David Chase

shows.name: The Big Bang Theory
shows.synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.
shows.cast: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
shows.creator: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady

shows.name: Friends
shows.synopsis: The lives, loves, and laughs of six young friends living in Manhattan.
shows.cast: Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow
shows.creator: David Crane, Marta Kauffman

movies.name: Inception
movies.synopsis: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
movies.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Ken Watanabe

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
movies.cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
movies.cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

movies.name: Goodfellas
movies.synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
movies.cast: Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci

movies.name: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.synopsis: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
movies.cast: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn

movies.name: The Prestige
movies.synopsis: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.
movies.cast: Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine

movies.name: The Departed
movies.synopsis: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
movies.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson

movies.name: Fight Club
movies.synopsis: An unnamed man, suffering from insomnia, struggles with his sanity and becomes plagued by hallucinations of a man who is similar to him, following the founding of a fight club with a mysterious man named Tyler Durden.
movies.cast: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter
